translation.titleBanner: Director / Head of Delivery & Operations • Delivery Manager • Specialist Project & Operations Manager

aboutInfo.resume: Professional with a consolidated career in project and operations management and leadership, with experience in national and international environments, serving major clients across Latin America, the United States, Europe, and Asia, including notable accounts such as ArcelorMittal, Apple, Petrobras, and Yara, among others. Among the main achievements, highlights include leading a global case that generated savings of over BRL 6 billion for a company in the oil and gas sector, as well as securing an additional BRL 120 million in financial gains in just three weeks. Additionally, I was responsible for implementing e-commerce platforms for clients generating annual revenue exceeding BRL 2.4 million, as well as driving automation initiatives that resulted in the reduction of over 2 million work hours across various sectors. My experience encompasses financial and budget management (P&L), strategic planning, contract management, corporate governance, definition and monitoring of goals, processes, and KPIs, as well as high-level negotiations and new business development. I have a solid track record in portfolio management (PMO), risk management and compliance, and leadership of multidisciplinary teams and project managers, ensuring operational efficiency, risk mitigation, and sustainable results delivery.

results.0: Led the implementation of e-commerce solutions for companies, generating over R$2.4 million in annual revenue.
results.1: Managed TCS’s pioneering HyperAutomation contract with Petrobras.
results.2: Oversaw a global project that resulted in savings of over R$5.78 billion for an oil and gas client, including more than R$120 million saved within just three weeks.
results.3: Achieved a financial margin improvement of over 400%.
results.4: Reduced more than 2 million work hours for clients through process automation initiatives.

highlights.1: Dollars saved in National and International clients.
highlights.2: Increase in financial margins in strategic projects.
highlights.4: Dollars in contracts managed with major clients.

homePageProject.title: Explore My Portfolio
homePageProject.text: I invite you to explore my portfolio of real-world projects, showcasing the clients I have supported through project management and digital transformation consultancy, along with a summary of the key initiatives and outcomes delivered for each.

serviceList.0: Project and Delivery Management (SCRUM, Waterfall, Lean & Smart)
serviceList.9: Volunteering for IT Job Market Replacement.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.text1: It will be a pleasure to discuss your challenges and develop a tailored solution for them.
contact.text2: Please use the channels below to get in touch with me.

aboutClient.0: American Express is one of the world's leading financial services companies, specializing in credit cards, digital payments, travel, and banking services. With over 160 years of history, American Express operates in more than 130 countries, providing innovative financial solutions for consumers, businesses, and merchants worldwide. Serving millions of individuals and businesses of various sizes, the company is recognized for its commitment to excellence and trust in the financial market.
aboutClient.1: Apple is one of the largest and most influential technology companies in the world, renowned for its innovation in hardware, software, and digital services. With iconic products such as the iPhone, iPad, MacBook, and Apple Watch, Apple has a global presence and over 147,000 employees. Its impact on the technology market is unparalleled, with millions of customers worldwide and a strong consumer loyalty base.
aboutClient.2: ArcelorMittal is one of the world's largest steel and metal production companies, with a global presence in over 60 countries. With more than 190,000 employees, ArcelorMittal is a leader in steel manufacturing and supplies products to various industries, including construction, automotive, and infrastructure. The company is known for its commitment to innovation, sustainability, and operational excellence.
aboutClient.3: Autoliv is one of the world's leading suppliers of automotive safety systems, specializing in airbags, seatbelts, and other critical vehicle safety components. With over 70 years of experience, Autoliv operates in more than 27 countries, employing over 60,000 people globally, and is a key player in the automotive industry, serving all major vehicle markets.
aboutClient.4: Avery Dennison is a leading American multinational specializing in labeling, packaging, and identification solutions, with operations in over 50 countries and more than 30,000 employees worldwide. The company stands out for its innovation and technology applied to various industries, including retail, logistics, automotive, and healthcare.
aboutClient.5: Exelon is one of the largest energy companies in the United States, providing electricity and gas to millions of customers. With operations across multiple states and a robust energy generation portfolio, Exelon is distinguished by its continuous pursuit of innovation and operational efficiency.
aboutClient.6: Fair Isaac Corporation (FICO) is a global leader in predictive analytics and decision-making technology, widely recognized for developing the FICO Score, one of the world's leading credit scoring models. With a presence in over 100 countries, the company provides innovative solutions for banks, insurers, retailers, and various industries, helping organizations make smarter, data-driven decisions.
aboutClient.7: Frontier Communications is one of the largest telecommunications service providers in the United States, offering broadband internet, telephone, and digital TV solutions to millions of customers. With a robust infrastructure and nationwide presence, the company continuously seeks innovation to optimize its processes and improve customer experience.
aboutClient.8: Grupo Boticário is one of Brazil's largest cosmetics and beauty product companies, with a strong global presence. With a portfolio of renowned brands such as O Boticário, Eudora, and quem disse, berenice?, the company operates in several countries and stands out for its innovation in product development and customer experience.
aboutClient.9: NextEra Energy is one of the world's largest renewable energy companies, focused on clean and sustainable power generation. With a diversified portfolio, including solar and wind energy, and a global presence in multiple countries, NextEra stands out for its leadership in sustainability and innovation in the energy sector.
aboutClient.10: Petrobras is one of the world's largest energy companies, operating across all stages of the oil and gas supply chain, from exploration to fuel distribution. With significant global presence and over 60 years of experience, Petrobras is a leader in the energy sector, contributing to the development of Brazil and other countries worldwide.
aboutClient.11: Petrobras is one of the world's largest energy and oil companies, specializing in the exploration, production, refining, and distribution of oil, natural gas, and derivatives. Founded in 1953, Petrobras has a significant presence in Brazil and various countries, with operations in over 20 nations and a workforce of more than 50,000 employees. The company plays a vital role in the development of the global energy sector and is recognized for its leadership in innovation and sustainability in the energy industry.
aboutClient.12: Roche is one of the world's leading pharmaceutical and diagnostics companies, specializing in innovative drug development and advanced diagnostic technologies. With over 120 years of history, Roche has a global presence, operating in more than 100 countries with a workforce of over 90,000 employees. The company is recognized for its leadership in combating serious diseases and its commitment to global health.
aboutClient.13: Selective is a renowned U.S.-based insurance company specializing in a wide range of insurance solutions for individuals and businesses, with a focus on automotive, property, and commercial insurance. With over 90 years of experience, Selective is recognized for its excellence in personalized services and strong market position, operating across multiple U.S. states.
aboutClient.14: SiteImprove is a leading provider of website optimization solutions, specializing in digital performance analytics, accessibility, and SEO tools. With a global customer base and strong market presence, SiteImprove helps companies improve user experience and ensure their websites are optimized for performance, security, and compliance.
aboutClient.15: TripTri is an innovative company in the travel and tourism sector, specializing in personalized solutions for clients seeking unique experiences in destinations worldwide. TripTri offers tour packages, airline tickets, accommodations, and exclusive services, catering to both individual travelers and groups. With a strong focus on customer service and innovation, the company is positioned to expand its presence in the global tourism market.
aboutClient.16: Yara International is a global leader in the fertilizer and agricultural solutions sector, focused on promoting sustainable agriculture and enhancing food security worldwide. Founded in Norway, Yara operates in over 60 countries with approximately 17,000 employees and is recognized for its innovation in products and services aimed at optimizing agricultural resources and environmental protection.

aboutProject.0: This OutSystems project aims to drive American Express's digital transformation by developing applications focused on the financial sector. The initiative seeks to optimize internal processes, enhancing agility and efficiency in the company's financial operations. By leveraging the OutSystems platform, American Express intends to create innovative, customized solutions that meet the growing demands of the financial industry, ensuring a faster and more secure experience for its customers and business partners. Through this project, American Express continues its digital innovation journey, making a significant impact on its operations and the financial market by adopting new technologies that improve transaction management, payments, and financial services.
aboutProject.1: This OutSystems project aims to support Apple's digital transformation by developing innovative applications for the technology sector. The initiative seeks to optimize and accelerate the development of internal solutions, improving integration between teams and systems while enabling faster delivery of new products and services. Using OutSystems allows Apple to quickly create and adapt applications to meet growing market demands and internal process needs. Through this project, Apple reinforces its leadership in innovation by leveraging the OutSystems platform to build faster and more efficient digital solutions, aligning with its goals of technological transformation and continuous market evolution.
aboutProject.2: This RPA (Robotic Process Automation) project, using the Automation Anywhere platform, aims to drive ArcelorMittal's digital transformation by focusing on operational hour savings and cost reduction. Automation is being implemented in critical processes using Microsoft Excel and SAP, optimizing workflows, reducing reliance on manual tasks, and increasing operational efficiency. This initiative not only enhances productivity but also ensures greater accuracy and consistency in processes, enabling ArcelorMittal to focus on strategic activities and maintain its industry leadership with more efficient and technologically advanced solutions.
aboutProject.3: This OutSystems project aims to accelerate Autoliv's digital transformation by developing innovative applications for the supply chain sector. The solution focuses on optimizing procurement management, inventory control, and supplier communication, enhancing efficiency and integration across various supply chain stages. By leveraging the OutSystems platform, Autoliv seeks to improve operational agility, reduce response times, and increase data accuracy, aligning technology with the company's strategic needs. This initiative reinforces Autoliv's commitment to innovation and operational efficiency in the automotive sector.
aboutProject.4: To accelerate its digital transformation, applications are being developed using the OutSystems platform to modernize processes and enhance operational efficiency. The project aims to create agile, scalable, and customized solutions that improve productivity, reduce costs, and elevate the experience for internal and external users. Through this initiative, Avery Dennison reinforces its commitment to innovation and digitalization, ensuring greater competitiveness and adaptability to new market demands.
aboutProject.5: To drive its digital transformation, RPA (Robotic Process Automation) solutions using UiPath are being implemented to automate repetitive and complex tasks. The project's primary objectives include saving operational hours, allowing employees to focus on strategic activities, reducing costs by eliminating time-consuming and inefficient manual processes, and minimizing human errors to ensure greater accuracy and compliance in operations. Automations are primarily developed for systems such as Oracle and Microsoft Excel, optimizing financial, administrative, and operational workflows. This initiative strengthens Exelon's efficiency, innovation, and competitiveness in the energy sector.
aboutProject.6: As part of its digital transformation, applications are being developed using the OutSystems platform to modernize essential systems and processes. The project aims to create agile and scalable solutions that meet business needs, optimize operational efficiency by reducing rework and increasing productivity, and enhance the experience for internal users and customers by making processes more intuitive and effective. Through this initiative, FICO reinforces its commitment to technological innovation, ensuring greater agility, competitiveness, and excellence in the credit analytics and data intelligence market.
aboutProject.7: As part of its digital transformation, advanced RPA (Robotic Process Automation) solutions are being implemented using UiPath and Pegasystems platforms. Automations are primarily developed for Microsoft Excel, optimizing the processing of large data volumes and improving decision-making based on structured information. This initiative strengthens Frontier Communications' operational efficiency and competitiveness in the telecommunications sector, positioning it as an increasingly digital and innovative company.
aboutProject.8: To enhance its digital transformation, Grupo Boticário has been implementing RPA (Robotic Process Automation) solutions using Automation Anywhere and Blue Prism platforms. Automations are primarily developed for systems such as Microsoft Excel and Citrix, optimizing financial, administrative, and operational workflows while accelerating the processing of large data volumes. This initiative reinforces Grupo Boticário's commitment to innovation and efficiency, strengthening its position in the cosmetics and beauty market and promoting an increasingly efficient and intelligent digital journey.
aboutProject.9: For its digital transformation, NextEra is implementing ServiceNow to optimize operations management and improve the efficiency of its technological infrastructure. The project's main objectives include monitoring technological activities to ensure real-time visibility of operations and identifying potential issues before they impact services, improving infrastructure by promoting automation and streamlining processes for greater operational efficiency, and enabling a more agile and strategic approach to service and process management, aligning technology with business needs. Through this initiative, NextEra Energy reinforces its commitment to innovation and sustainability, ensuring more efficient, agile, and integrated operations to maintain its leadership in the renewable energy market.
aboutProject.10: This RPA (Robotic Process Automation) project, using the Automation Anywhere platform, aims to drive Petrobras's digital transformation by saving operational hours and reducing costs. Automation of repetitive and complex processes has been implemented in critical systems such as Microsoft Excel, SAP, Citrix, and Petronect, optimizing workflows and ensuring greater efficiency and accuracy in operations.
aboutProject.11: This OutSystems project aims to support Petrobras's digital transformation by modernizing legacy applications using .NET. The initiative seeks to update and integrate outdated systems, providing greater agility, scalability, and operational efficiency. Leveraging the OutSystems platform enables Petrobras to modernize its IT processes, optimize the development of new applications, and increase flexibility to adapt quickly to changes in the energy market. Through this transformation, Petrobras strengthens its position in the energy sector, striving for greater efficiency and innovation in its internal processes while delivering more agile and modern solutions for its operational and strategic challenges. This project is a true global success story, delivering exceptional results, including savings of over R$ 6 billion in one year and R$ 120 million in just three weeks. The automation implementation has generated significant productivity gains, reduced human errors, and accelerated critical processes, positioning Petrobras at the forefront of innovation in the energy sector.
aboutProject.12: This Java development project aims to drive Roche's digital transformation by creating PMO (Project Management Office) applications that optimize project management and enhance collaboration among teams. Focusing on innovation and continuous improvement of internal processes, the project seeks to integrate technological solutions that increase efficiency, agility, and precision in project tracking and execution. This initiative is part of Roche's digital strategy to strengthen project management, ensuring greater control, transparency, and alignment with the company's strategic objectives.
aboutProject.13: This OutSystems project aims to support Selective's digital transformation by developing innovative applications for the insurance sector. The implementation of agile and scalable solutions seeks to optimize processes, improve customer experience, and increase operational efficiency. The project aims to modernize how the company manages and delivers its insurance products and services, enabling better integration and automation of internal processes and a smoother, more digital experience for customers. Through this initiative, Selective strengthens its position as an industry leader by adopting cutting-edge technologies that transform and enhance its interactions with customers and operational management.
aboutProject.14: This RPA (Robotic Process Automation) project, using the Automation Anywhere platform, aims to drive SiteImprove's digital transformation by saving operational hours and reducing costs. Automation has been implemented in critical processes using systems such as Microsoft Excel, SAP, Citrix, and Salesforce to optimize workflows, reduce human errors, and enhance operational efficiency. The initiative not only increases productivity but also ensures greater accuracy in internal processes, allowing SiteImprove's teams to focus on higher-value strategic activities. Through this approach, SiteImprove continues to position itself at the forefront of digital innovation, delivering more efficient and higher-quality solutions to its customers.
aboutProject.15: This project aims to drive TripTri's digital transformation by modernizing the company to enable online sales and overall business management via an online administration system. The creation of an eCommerce platform will allow TripTri to offer its services in an agile and accessible manner, providing a streamlined purchasing experience for customers. Additionally, implementing an integrated management system will enable efficient control of sales, inventory, reservations, and customer data in real time. Through this transformation, TripTri modernizes itself, gaining greater autonomy and flexibility while offering a more intuitive and efficient digital purchasing experience for its customers. This will allow the company to expand its reach, improve competitiveness, and continue delivering exceptional service in the tourism industry.
aboutProject.16: The ServiceNow project implemented for Yara primarily aims to digitally transform the company's technological operations, focusing on monitoring technological activities and improving IT infrastructure. The solution optimizes internal processes, enhances real-time visibility of IT operations, and ensures greater efficiency in incident and service management. The initiative seeks to make Yara's operations more agile and integrated, improving the management and response to the company's technological needs. Adopting ServiceNow enables a more effective and strategic approach, aligning technological infrastructure with the company's global objectives and fostering continuous and sustainable transformation.
aboutProject.17: The analytics and data projects at ArcelorMittal play a fundamental strategic role by enabling continuous and structured monitoring of key information across various company areas, such as taxation, supply chain, production, logistics, sales, and more. Through the consolidation and analysis of large data volumes, these initiatives provide an integrated and precise view of the company's operational and financial performance, identifying deviations, improvement opportunities, and relevant business trends. Beyond directly supporting strategic decision-making, the data projects enable the creation of executive reports and dashboards that ensure greater agility, reliability, and transparency in communication with top leadership. By fostering a data-driven culture, the company strengthens its innovation capabilities, gains a competitive edge, and enhances efficiency across the entire value chain, from raw material acquisition to final product delivery. In this way, the analytics projects solidify as essential pillars for ArcelorMittal's sustainability and continuous growth in an increasingly dynamic and challenging market.
aboutProject.18: The Artificial Intelligence projects at ArcelorMittal represent an innovative front that has transformed how the company monitors, analyzes, and acts on strategic data across various areas, such as taxation, supply chain, production, logistics, and sales. Using advanced technologies, these projects enable real-time tracking of critical information, automate tasks, and expand the organization's analytical capabilities. One of the major innovations of these projects is the application of language models (LLMs), capable of interpreting and extracting relevant data from unstructured documents like PDFs, invoices, contracts, and technical reports. This has led to significant efficiency gains, especially in areas requiring large-scale document analysis. Additionally, AI is being used to manipulate and correlate information from different sources, aiding in identifying patterns, improvement opportunities, and new operational directions across various company processes. These solutions also automate workflow steps, optimizing time, reducing operational errors, and freeing teams to focus on more strategic activities.
aboutProject.19: The fullstack development projects at ArcelorMittal primarily aim to create customized applications tailored to the specific needs of each company area. Through tailored technological solutions, these applications are designed to address operational challenges, optimize processes, and improve the experience for both internal users and external customers and partners. With an approach that integrates front-end and back-end development, fullstack teams deliver complete solutions adapted to the realities of areas like production, supply chain, sales, human resources, logistics, and more. These applications not only facilitate daily operations for teams but also promote greater agility, control, and visibility over processes. Furthermore, the fullstack projects directly contribute to process digitization and information standardization, supporting strategic decision-making and reducing rework. The flexibility and scalability of these solutions allow ArcelorMittal to respond quickly to new market demands and customer needs, reinforcing its commitment to innovation, efficiency, and operational excellence.

0.0: Responsible for managing projects involving various technologies at an industrial sector company, leading strategic initiatives aimed at improving customer relationships and strengthening partnerships. I lead projects in BI, Artificial Intelligence, RPA, Fullstack, and Data, focusing on value generation, innovation, and operational efficiency. I manage technical resources, oversee the full delivery flow, and utilize the Azure platform for demand control, ensuring organization, visibility, and team productivity. I prepare executive reports for clients, maintaining constant communication with stakeholders and ensuring alignment on expectations, risks, and project progress. I also handle the production and management of project documentation and actively participate in strategic and tactical planning. I directly contribute to team growth by supporting the structuring, development, and training of professionals involved in operations.

1.0: Managed projects and accounts for 13 clients across Latin America and the United States, leading more than 100 professionals. Delivered training and mentoring to project managers and conducted sales, pre-sales, and executive meetings. Participated in RFP preparation and identified business opportunities with clients and stakeholders. Responsible for IT operations implementation and management, KPI creation, goal setting, and performance monitoring. Oversaw project P&L, applied MIP strategies, developed financial plans, and managed risks. Managed the sales pipeline, participated in contractual renegotiations and claims development, and led internal audit processes. Produced executive reports, ensured compliance with contractual clauses, and engaged in technological initiatives with clients. Implemented performance improvement plans, developed internal processes, delegated tasks, conducted team feedback sessions, and led SCRUM ceremonies.

2.0: Defined delivery workflows and documentation standards in the RPA domain, ensuring organization, quality, and scalability in projects. Conducted comparative analyses between human effort and bot effort to identify operational gains. Prepared technical documentation such as PDD, TDD, and SDD, and performed complete process mapping (AS-IS and TO-BE). Led requirements analysis and specifications, maintaining frequent client communication for updates, approvals, and feasibility assessments. Carried out technical and financial feasibility studies for new automations aligned with business needs. Developed automations using Automation Anywhere A360 and Control Room, and integrated with various systems, platforms, and websites across operational processes. Standardized bot architectures and codes, ensuring adherence to best practices. Also executed operations and testing inside and outside production environments, ensuring stability, quality, and performance.

3.0: Strategic involvement in process automation projects using the Automation Anywhere A360 platform, from bot architecture analysis and standardization to integration with systems, platforms, and websites. Experience in operations and testing in both production and non-production environments, with active client involvement during critical project stages. Proficient in Control Room, IQBot, AARI, and Bot Insights tools, with practical application of concepts such as BPM, DRY, and SOLID to develop scalable and sustainable solutions. Led technical teams and fostered team growth by identifying strengths and improvement areas. Handled all stages of the project lifecycle, including the preparation of technical documentation (PDD, TDD, and SDD) and client meetings for validation, approval, and technical feasibility. Strong background in agile methodologies, especially in implementing SCRUM in the RPA area. Actively contributed to technical pre-sales, POC development, automation feasibility analysis, and training developers in both hard and soft skills. Skilled in reading and mapping AS-IS and TO-BE structures and critically analyzing requirements for adherence to best development practices.

4.0: Automated tasks and processes using RPA tools, with a focus on the Automation Anywhere platform, integrating with documents, internal systems, web platforms, websites, and enterprise software such as SAP. Developed projects using MetaBots, from technical specification, PDDs, SDDs, and contingency plans to testing in production and non-production environments. Conducted assisted operations with direct client involvement, ensuring delivery stability and quality. Provided technical leadership for client-allocated teams, including developer support and training. Actively analyzed processes with business teams to evaluate and develop new bots. Developed proof of concept (POC) and participated in technical meetings with international teams. Managed Control Room for bot deployment and monitoring in production, and maintained close communication with stakeholders to ensure alignment in project updates, validations, and approvals.

5.0: Developed e-commerce platforms and institutional websites, actively contributing to projects based on OpenCart, WooCommerce, and WordPress. Configured and maintained basic server infrastructure with practical experience in AWS environments. Worked in agile frameworks, with a focus on SCRUM, Kanban, and Agile methodologies, holding leadership roles and ensuring integration between technical and business teams. Strong technical foundation in PHP, CSS3, HTML5, JavaScript (MVC standard), and MySQL, and worked in development environments like VSCode, Sublime Text, and XAMPP. Used project management tools such as Jira and Notion for organization, tracking, and delivery control. Provided client support, bug fixing, and staff training on system functionalities, and engaged in direct communication with managers to define and assess new project viability.

6.0: Prepared operational documentation and standards, managed financial resources, accounts payable, and monthly financial reporting. Strategically analyzed the Brazilian market to identify opportunities across sectors for product placement and guided commercial prospecting. Built sales metrics and analyzed management reports for decision-making based on channels, relationship strategies, sales cycle efficiency, and portfolio alignment. Focused on market need analysis and continuous operational improvement, ensuring product versioning and alignment with niche-specific demands. Actively involved in client and supplier prospecting and conducted consultative sales of customized products for targeted audiences. Experienced in continuous improvement planning, KPI definition and monitoring, and strategic product pricing to maximize competitiveness and profit margins.

volunteer.volunteerText: I support individuals re-entering the IT job market by assisting with activities such as:
volunteer.volunteerText2: I provide mentorship for the development of coordinators, managers, and executives, focusing on:

volunteerList.1: Creating connections and networking with recruiters from various sectors.
volunteerList.2: Providing tips on how to present oneself and perform effectively in interviews.
volunteerList.3: Presenting various approaches tailored to different job roles.
volunteerList.4: Offering support in aligning the individual’s knowledge with their desired position or career path.
volunteerList.5: Conducting end-to-end professional follow-up until a job offer is accepted.

mentoringList.0: Measuring attitudes in specific customer-facing situations;
mentoringList.1: How to lead your teams and manage operations effectively;
mentoringList.2: Defining the most relevant KPIs for project monitoring;
mentoringList.4: How to mitigate high-risk situations involving stakeholders.

translation.helMsg: Do you need help? Contact me with
